summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to sign and accept all documents necessary to complete an exchange of real property consisting of an easement for ingress and egress across the South Winthrop Street portion of Cheasty Boulevard to be granted to the University of Washington for two parcels of land, one owned by the University of Washington and one owned by Sound Transit augmenting the Cheasty Natural Area and finding that said exchange is necessary and no reasonable alternative exists consistent with the requirements of Ordinance 118477.
